author: Robert Morris
releaseNotes:
* Version 1.5.1 - Filter device list when different detection methods are chosen

* Version 1.5 - Added battery level as a report/notification option

* Version 1.4.7 - Fix for missing dates on some reports

* Version 1.4.6 - Fix spurious warning in logs when using presence detection and refresh

Version 1.4.5 - Additional refinements to 'refresh' behavior if configured; fix for inactivity thresholds >24 hours

* Version 1.4.4 - Fix for hours/minutes display when calculating total time for threshold (cosmetic issue only)
Version 1.4.3: Fix for possible Null Pointer Exception when checking presence-based devices.
Version 1.4.2: Fix for refresh not working with inactive devices before notification or report.

Version 1.4: Added links to device pages on hub report/test page; improved refresh behavior.
Version 1.3: Added ability to refresh devices before sending notification, choose multiple notification devices, and added default date/time formatting for reprot page

Previous releases:
 * Added ability to monitor presence instead of just device activity
 * Added ability to ignore disabled devices (on by default)
